tool_description: Estimates delivery windows using current shipment data, carrier performance history, weather conditions, and regional factors.

consider_weather.description: Factor in weather conditions for estimation

consider_holidays.description: Account for holidays in delivery estimation

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provide a valid 5 or 9-digit ZIP code.
Unsupported service type: Use a recognized service type for the specified carrier.
Invalid ship date: Ship date must be in the past and in ISO 8601 format.
Location not found: Unable to geocode the current location or destination.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data to make accurate estimates.
usage: Provide tracking_number, current_location, destination_zip, carrier, service_type, and ship_date. Optionally enable weather and holiday considerations for more accurate estimates.

estimated_delivery_min.description: Earliest estimated delivery date and time

estimated_delivery_max.description: Latest estimated delivery date and time

factors_considered.description: List of factors used in the estimation

transit_days_remaining.description: Estimated business days remaining for delivery
